reviews.review: Sooo Many Hackers... Valve is sleeping.
This Game is to fucking fun it takes around 100 hours to learn the games but once you do and play Comp it is so much fun

CS:GO was once a great game that we often got updated maps, reworks, weapons, operations. That ended in 2016, and has been on a decline ever since. The game has been entirely neglected filled with hackers and all that they have been pumping out since is skins and music packs.

Also, where is Source 2? LOL
VAC is about as useful as the traffic lights in GTA

The points are made and ranks don't matter, anymore. Ever since this game has gone free to play I have seen an influx of smurfs and hackers. Valve also needs the fix the matchmaking, I am constantly being matched against people atleast 3 ranks higher than me and valve says this is ok because they are queued with one person who is one rank below me. 3/10 use to be slightly better. is still fun to play with friends as long as none of you care about ranks or actually doing good

Counter Strike Global Offensive has its downs like every other game out there. And you could rip this game to threads about all of the downsides to it and how it sucks almost all the time. But Counter Strike is more than just a game, its a community, friendship, and work ethic. There is so much more at stake when playing this game than just entertainment. There are professional games that you can watch, franchises and organizations that you can cheer for, players you can meet in servers that you would have never met outside this game, and most importantly, an escape from reality. For me, Counter Strike is a life style.
This game is a dumpster baby.
this game is literal autism. dont play
